metadata.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

0.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
0.text: May we all breathe deep of the Wavemother's waters!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

1.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
1.text: We won't forget this - and neither will Umberlee.
1.context: NodeContext: Warmly (but still accidentally sounds a little like a threat)

2.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
2.text: Oh, Umberlee, hear us! Umberlee, bring your daughter home!
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

3.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
3.text: Our gratitude is as deep as the Sea of Swords! Thank you for avenging our sweet sister.
